title: The Alex Jones Show - Alex Jones - ALL FOUR PLUS HOURS AND OVERD
description:
THE EMPIRE IS ON THE RUN..........All 4 PLUS Hours AND OVERDRIVE

Alex is known for not just talking the talk, but walking the walk. He combines his media presence with 

actual physical activism, a practice that once led to him being arrested on the personal order of George 

W. Bush! Alex Jones has gained international attention for standing up for what he believes in.

From Italy&#039;s La Prensa to the Wall Street Journal and USA Today, Jones has brought the information war 

to the mainstream print media worldwide, speaking out against tyranny in defense of the Constitution.

Total Recorder 4.4 Capture in 48 kbs stereo from Ku satellite feed or 56 kbs internet streaming audio with 

commercial edit. About 6.25 hr listening time.

PM me with any of your comments.

Todays gueststopic: Jason Bermas stands in for Alex

1st HR. - News and OpenLines. Jason discusses the issues of the day and takes your calls.

2nd HR. - News and OpenLines. Jason discusses the issues of the day and takes your calls.
 
3rd HR. - News and OpenLines. Prison Planet editor and journalist, Paul Joseph Watson.

4th HR. - News and OpenLines.  Guests include author Jim Marrs
